mapper.select: SELECT BILL_FORM_NO, JS.PATIENTS_NO, PB_VISIT_DATE, BF.NIGHT, CHECKUP, HOSPITALIZATION, MEALS, DOSE, INJECTION, ANESTHETIZE, OPERATION, EXAMINATION, RADIATION, TREATMENT, SELF_PAY, PHYSICAL_THERAPY, PSYCHOTHERAPEUTICS, ULTRASONIC, SELECTION_TREAT, MEDICAL_HERBS, ETC, JS.CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME FROM TB_BILL_FORM BF JOIN TB_PATIENTS P USING (PATIENTS_NO) JOIN TB_JS JS ON (BF.CHART_NO = JS.CHART_NO) WHERE PB_VISIT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CLINIC_STATE = 2

SELECT BILL_FORM_NO, JS.PATIENTS_NO, PB_VISIT_DATE, BF.NIGHT, CHECKUP, HOSPITALIZATION, MEALS, DOSE, INJECTION, ANESTHETIZE, OPERATION, EXAMINATION, RADIATION, TREATMENT, SELF_PAY, PHYSICAL_THERAPY, PSYCHOTHERAPEUTICS, ULTRASONIC, SELECTION_TREAT, MEDICAL_HERBS, ETC, JS.CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME FROM TB_BILL_FORM BF JOIN TB_PATIENTS P USING (PATIENTS_NO) JOIN TB_JS JS ON (BF.CHART_NO = JS.CHART_NO) WHERE PB_VISIT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CLINIC_STATE = 4

SELECT BILL_FORM_NO, PATIENTS_NO, PB_VISIT_DATE, CHECKUP, HOSPITALIZATION, MEALS, DOSE, INJECTION, ANESTHETIZE, OPERATION, EXAMINATION, RADIATION, TREATMENT, SELF_PAY, PHYSICAL_THERAPY, PSYCHOTHERAPEUTICS, ULTRASONIC, SELECTION_TREAT, MEDICAL_HERBS, ETC, CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME, DAY_NOTE, CHAIN_NOTE FROM TB_BILL_FORM BF JOIN TB_PATIENTS P USING (PATIENTS_NO) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo}
SELECT DISTINCT SALARY_CLASSIFIC FROM TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART WHERE CHART_NO = ${chartNo}

SELECT BF.PATIENTS_NO, CHECKUP, DOSE, OPERATION, RADIATION, PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_PNO, INSURANCE, MO, ADHD, CHART_NO FROM TB_PATIENTS JOIN TB_JS USING (PATIENTS_NO) JOIN TB_BILL_FORM BF USING (CHART_NO) WHERE CHART_NO IN (SELECT CHART_NO FROM TB_BILL_FORM JOIN TB_JS USING (CHART_NO) WHERE CLINIC_STATE = #{num})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BILL_FORM WHERE CHART_NO=#{chartNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BILL_FORM VALUES(SEQ_BF_NO.NEXTVAL, (SELECT PATIENTS_NO FROM TB_JS WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo}), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), DEFAULT, (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '진찰료'), NULL, NULL, (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '투약'), NULL, NULL, (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '처치'), NULL, (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '방사선'), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{chartNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BILL_FORM SET CHECKUP = (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '진찰료'), DOSE = (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '투약'), OPERATION = (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '처치'), RADIATION = (SELECT SUM(PRESCRIP_INSUP * TOTAL_AD) FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTIONCHART USING (PRESCRIP_USER_CODE) WHERE CHART_NO = #{chartNo} AND PRESCRIP_TYPE = '방사선') WHERE CHART_NO=#{chartNo}
